ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind IRednerableSeriesViewModel to RenderableSeries on SciChartSurface.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to use MVVM to databind IAxisViewModels to a SciChartSurface using the new [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#MVM%20Axis%20API.html']AxisBinding Markup Extension[/url], which forms part of the MVVM API in SciChart.
By binding SciChartSurface.YAxes or XAxes to a collection of [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.ChartSeries.AxisBaseViewModel.html']AxisBaseViewModel derived Types[/url] via the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Common.MarkupExtensions.AxesBinding.html']AxesBinding Markup Extension[/url], you can have full control over the series type, style, properties and data displayed on the chart from your ViewModel.
Check the source-code of this example for more details on how we achieve this with SciChart.
